---
listing:
  contents: posts/teaching/*/*.qmd  # 子目录储存 子目录文件
  sort: "date desc"  # 按日期降序排序
  type: grid  # 默认的博客样式列表
  categories: true  # #cloud启用分类过滤 展示为词云
  sort-ui: true  # 启用排序功能
  filter-ui: [author,date, categories,description]  # 启用筛选功能
  fields: [date,author, title, image, categories,subtitle,description]  # 显示日期、标题、阅读时间、描述和分类
  image-align: right  # 图片放置在内容的左侧
  image-height: 130px  # 设置图片高度为150px
  image-placeholder: "/path/to/default-image.jpg"  # 如果没有图片则显示默认图片
#feed: true  # 启用 RSS 源生成
title-block-banner: true  # 关闭标题块横幅
title: "Teaching"  # 页面标题
#description: "A collection of blog posts about various topics."
format:
  html:
    page-layout: full  # 页面全宽布局
    grid:
      body-width: 1000px  # 正文宽度
      margin-width: 200px  # 页边距
---
:::{#posts-listing}
:::
